title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body: Nice! Two weeks of Doom Bots! Can't wait to get rekt!
Can't wait for Doombots! Thanks Riot :).

Long ago, the four nations played hide and seek together in harmony. Then, everything changed when Riot attacked and removed the Crystal Scar from custom games. Only a good game designer, master of all things the community wants, could stop them, but when the world needed him most, he vanished. A few months passed and my brother and I discovered a new game, an amazing game named Overwatch. And although its great, it has a lot to learn before its ready to be more fun then hide and seek. But I believe League of Legends can become great again. 

ps. bring back crystal scar so we can have fun again

Hey riot, I understand we don't have the player base like other regions to bring in extra modes like Dominion, but could we add the mode into the special game rotation on the weekends please? 

Definitely Not Dominion is fun, but its definitely not the same as Dominion. I miss playing Domninion back before I joined OCE. Its been years...Please consider it.
Ugh doom bots worst timing ever. Right at the time of assessments ;_;

i don't want 4 days of DBOTS
I WANT PERMA DOOM BOTS MODE CHOICE
6 LEVELS, 1 BOMB, 2 BOMBS 5 BOMBS, 10 BOMBS 20 BOMBS AND 100 BOMBS.
RITO GET TO WORK BOY!
Riot heard my call Dx Dooms Day don don duon!

DOOM BOTS NEEDS TO REPLACE ARAM AS THE PERMANENT GAME MODE! Maybe it would get constantly updated with new Doom bots. 

It would be pretty cool if every champion had a Doom Bot version of itself wearing the most EVIL LOOKING champion skin available for the Doom bot to wear.

What Mann vs Machine is to Team Fortress 2, Doom Bots is to LOL!

and so once again you have removed one of the only things that makes this game fun and worth playing. Why wont you just give us back dominion so we can play hide and seek in peace. useless game designer whoever thought it was a good idea to remove the crystal scar (original) from customs

i`v been waiting for other doom bots for so long 

AND ITS finally here :D
DOOM BOTS! YAYYYYYYYYYY! MY LIFE IS COMPLETE!
thanks heaps for the good news on doom bots L4T3NCY {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
